attributes.action: Abolish VAT on petrol/diesel for disabled people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The purpose of this petition is to persuade the government to abolish VAT on petrol/diesel for disabled people.
This could either be upon purchase of the petrol/diesel, or by reclaiming the VAT at the end of the financial year.
The cost of remaining mobile can be very high and anything that can help would be beneficial.
The amount that is paid through VAT on an average full tank of fuel costing £60 is £10.50. That £10.50 over a year could mean that at least one more full tank of fuel could be purchased. Therefore giving the disabled person a bit more freedom and independence.
